channel.title: [REQUEST] 317 Blank Server souce and/or client - Will pay RSPG!
channel.description:
~ I'm basically looking for a server source that you can walk around in with no NPCs standing anywhere, just a plain 317 souce, Possibly with no Commands added (but a command that tell you your location would help out a lot!), Client.java file, Compiler, RunServer. [b]1.5m RSPG[/b]
A Client that works with the server [b]1m RSPG[/b]
I'm not really good with server, the only things I know how to do are add NPCs, and change values...

item.title: [REQUEST] 317 Blank Server souce and/or client - Will pay RSPG!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“peanut ninja, post:1, topic:401747”]~
I’m basically looking for a server source that you can walk around in with no NPCs standing anywhere, just a plain 317 souce, Possibly with no Commands added (but a command that tell you your location would help out a lot!), Client.java file, Compiler, RunServer.
1.5m RSPG

A Client that works with the server
1m RSPG

I’m not really good with server, the only things I know how to do are add NPCs, and change values…[/quote]

You cannot pay for anything on these forums; with the exception of SCAR scripts. And even then, those are only posted on mitb.

All you have to do is go to the downloads section, find a blank source (there’s a sticky), Download any 317 that doesn’t have a modified protocol, and you can play.

Read full topic
